DOC.brief_summary: This study comparative design 2 group subject attend class back education urban setting . Participants randomize either individual one-on-one back school session 8 group session .
DOC.brief_title: Back School Non-specific Low Back Pain ( LBP ) Urban Setting
DOC.criteria: Participants 18 year age old suffer nonspecific LBP least 3 month Additional impairment contraindicate safe participation back school program , evidence spinal cord pathology , cauda equina , progressive neurological damage , infection , inflammation , malignancy , fracture progressive , neurodegenerative disease well back surgery within past year
